-  GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/searchKeywords 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/searchKeywords

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-searchKeywords#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/searchKeywords
```

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-searchKeywords#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`
